de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.transport

Interface TransportConnection

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SocketTransportConnection

    public interface TransportConnection
    Generic TransportConnection to control an underlying connection.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Closes the connection.
      de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.attribute.Attributed getAttributes()
      Returns the connection's attributes.
      boolean isOpen()
      Checks if the connection is open.
      boolean isSelfInititated()
      Returns if the connection was initiated by this side.
      void open(TransportListener listener)
      Opens the connection and registers a listener for incoming data.
      void send(ByteBuffer buffer)
      Sends data via this connection.

    • Method Detail

      • isSelfInititated

        boolean isSelfInititated()
        Returns if the connection was initiated by this side.
        Returns:
        true if connection was initiated by this side and false if not

      • isOpen

        boolean isOpen()
        Checks if the connection is open.
        Returns:
        true if connection is open and data can be written/read, false if connection is closed.

      • open

        void open(TransportListener listener)
          throws ConnectionException
        Opens the connection and registers a listener for incoming data.
        Parameters:
        listener - the listener for incoming data
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - if open fails

      • send

        void send(ByteBuffer buffer)
          throws ConnectionException
        Sends data via this connection.
        Parameters:
        buffer - the data to send
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - if send fails

      • close

        void close()
        Closes the connection. No further data can be send. Connection cannot be reopened.

      • getAttributes

        de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.attribute.Attributed getAttributes()
        Returns the connection's attributes.
        Returns:
        the connection's attributes
